title: Two Sum
description: Given an array and a target value, find two distinct indices such that the elements at those indices add up to the target. Print the indices (0-based) separated by a space. If multiple pairs exist, return the first one you find scanning from left to right.
explanation: You are provided with an integer array and a target sum. Find any pair of indices whose elements add up to the target. If no such pair exists, print '-1 -1'.

arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
target = int(input())
